body.body:
Monty Hall has hidden a prize behind one of these doors.

{{feedback_feedbackblock_5230230101c5b114573823}} {{feedback_feedbackblock_5230230101db2732782904}} {{feedback_feedbackblock_5230230101efe614426757}} {{feedback_feedbackblock_523023010204b986910240}} {{interaction_choiceinteraction_523023010061c134796410}} {{feedback_feedbackblock_5230230102193954521289}}

responseProcessing:
O:41:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_response_Custom":5:{s:7:"�*�data";s:6768:"<responseProcessing>
		<setOutcomeValue identifier="completionStatus">
			<baseValue baseType="identifier">incomplete</baseValue>
		</setOutcomeValue>
		<responseCondition>
			<responseIf>
				<!-- Transition from openingGambit to tempter -->
				<and>
					<match>
						<baseValue baseType="identifier">openingGambit</baseValue>
						<variable identifier="STORY"/>
					</match>
					<not>
						<isNull>
							<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
						</isNull>
					</not>
				</and>
				<!-- Remember the first door chosen -->
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="FIRSTDOOR">
					<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
				</setOutcomeValue>
				<responseCondition>
					<responseIf>
						<match>
							<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
							<variable identifier="PRIZEDOOR"/>
						</match>
						<!-- Randomly open one of the other two doors -->
						<responseCondition>
							<responseIf>
								<match>
									<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
									<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorA</baseValue>
								</match>
								<setOutcomeValue identifier="REVEALED">
									<random>
										<multiple>
											<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorB</baseValue>
											<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorC</baseValue>
										</multiple>
									</random>
								</setOutcomeValue>
							</responseIf>
							<responseElseIf>
								<match>
									<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
									<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorB</baseValue>
								</match>
								<setOutcomeValue identifier="REVEALED">
									<random>
										<multiple>
											<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorA</baseValue>
											<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorC</baseValue>
										</multiple>
									</random>
								</setOutcomeValue>
							</responseElseIf>
							<responseElse>
								<setOutcomeValue identifier="REVEALED">
									<random>
										<multiple>
											<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorA</baseValue>
											<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorB</baseValue>
										</multiple>
									</random>
								</setOutcomeValue>
							</responseElse>
						</responseCondition>
					</responseIf>
					<responseElse>
						<!-- Open the other losing door -->
						<responseCondition>
							<responseIf>
								<not>
									<member>
										<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorA</baseValue>
										<multiple>
											<variable identifier="PRIZEDOOR"/>
											<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
										</multiple>
									</member>
								</not>
								<setOutcomeValue identifier="REVEALED">
									<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorA</baseValue>
								</setOutcomeValue>
							</responseIf>
							<responseElseIf>
								<not>
									<member>
										<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorB</baseValue>
										<multiple>
											<variable identifier="PRIZEDOOR"/>
											<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
										</multiple>
									</member>
								</not>
								<setOutcomeValue identifier="REVEALED">
									<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorB</baseValue>
								</setOutcomeValue>
							</responseElseIf>
							<responseElse>
								<setOutcomeValue identifier="REVEALED">
									<baseValue baseType="identifier">DoorC</baseValue>
								</setOutcomeValue>
							</responseElse>
						</responseCondition>
					</responseElse>
				</responseCondition>
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="CLOSED">
					<delete>
						<variable identifier="REVEALED"/>
						<variable identifier="CLOSED"/>
					</delete>
				</setOutcomeValue>
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="GOATS">
					<multiple>
						<variable identifier="REVEALED"/>
					</multiple>
				</setOutcomeValue>
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="STORY">
					<baseValue baseType="identifier">tempter</baseValue>
				</setOutcomeValue>
			</responseIf>
			<responseElseIf>
				<!-- Transition from tempter to prize or goat -->
				<and>
					<match>
						<baseValue baseType="identifier">tempter</baseValue>
						<variable identifier="STORY"/>
					</match>
					<not>
						<isNull>
							<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
						</isNull>
					</not>
				</and>
				<!-- Whether you won or not, we score based on whether you switched -->
				<responseCondition>
					<responseIf>
						<match>
							<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
							<variable identifier="FIRSTDOOR"/>
						</match>
						<setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE">
							<baseValue baseType="float">0</baseValue>
						</setOutcomeValue>
					</responseIf>
					<responseElse>
						<setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE">
							<baseValue baseType="float">1</baseValue>
						</setOutcomeValue>
					</responseElse>
				</responseCondition>
				<!-- Now determine if you won the prize and open your chosen door -->
				<responseCondition>
					<responseIf>
						<match>
							<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
							<variable identifier="PRIZEDOOR"/>
						</match>
						<setOutcomeValue identifier="PRIZE">
							<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
						</setOutcomeValue>
						<setOutcomeValue identifier="STORY">
							<baseValue baseType="identifier">prize</baseValue>
						</setOutcomeValue>
					</responseIf>
					<responseElse>
						<setOutcomeValue identifier="GOATS">
							<multiple>
								<variable identifier="GOATS"/>
								<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
							</multiple>
						</setOutcomeValue>
						<setOutcomeValue identifier="STORY">
							<baseValue baseType="identifier">goat</baseValue>
						</setOutcomeValue>
					</responseElse>
				</responseCondition>
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="CLOSED">
					<delete>
						<variable identifier="DOOR"/>
						<variable identifier="CLOSED"/>
					</delete>
				</setOutcomeValue>
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="FEEDBACK">
					<baseValue baseType="identifier">poser</baseValue>
				</setOutcomeValue>
			</responseElseIf>
			<responseElseIf>
				<and>
					<match>
						<variable identifier="FEEDBACK"/>
						<baseValue baseType="identifier">poser</baseValue>
					</match>
					<not>
						<isNull>
							<variable identifier="RESPONSE"/>
						</isNull>
					</not>
				</and>
				<responseCondition>
					<responseIf>
						<match>
							<variable identifier="RESPONSE"/>
							<correct identifier="RESPONSE"/>
						</match>
						<setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE">
							<sum>
								<variable identifier="SCORE"/>
								<baseValue baseType="float">2</baseValue>
							</sum>
						</setOutcomeValue>
					</responseIf>
				</responseCondition>
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="FEEDBACK">
					<variable identifier="RESPONSE"/>
				</setOutcomeValue>
				<setOutcomeValue identifier="completionStatus">
					<baseValue baseType="identifier">completed</baseValue>
				</setOutcomeValue>
			</responseElseIf>
		</responseCondition>
	</responseProcessing>";s:16:"�*�responseRules";a:2:{i:0;O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_response_SetOutcomeVariable":2:{s:25:"outcomeVariableIdentifier";s:16:"completionStatus";s:10:"expression";O:46:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_BaseValue":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:0:{}s:8:"�*�value";s:10:"incomplete";s:7:"�*�name";s:9:"baseValue";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:1:{s:8:"baseType";s:10:"identifier";}}}i:1;O:52:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_response_ResponseCondition":2:{s:14:"�*�responseIfs";a:3:{i:0;O:56:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_response_ConditionalExpression":2:{s:12:"�*�condition";O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_CommonExpression":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:2:{i:0;O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_CommonExpression":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:2:{i:0;O:46:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_BaseValue":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:0:{}s:8:"�*�value";s:13:"openingGambit";s:7:"�*�name";s:9:"baseValue";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:1:{s:8:"baseType";s:10:"identifier";}}i:1;O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_CommonExpression":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:0:{}s:8:"�*�value";N;s:7:"�*�name";s:8:"variable";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:1:{s:10:"identifier";s:5:"STORY";}}}s:8:"�*�value";N;s:7:"�*�name";s:5:"match";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:0:{}}i:1;O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_CommonExpression":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:1:{i:0;O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_CommonExpression":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:1:{i:0;O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_expression_CommonExpression":4:{s:17:"�*�subExpressions";a:0:{}s:8:"�*�value";N;s:7:"�*�name";s:8:"variable";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:1:{s:10:"identifier";s:4:"DOOR";}}}s:8:"�*�value";N;s:7:"�*�name";s:6:"isNull";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:0:{}}}s:8:"�*�value";N;s:7:"�*�name";s:3:"not";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:0:{}}}s:8:"�*�value";N;s:7:"�*�name";s:3:"and";s:13:"�*�attributes";a:0:{}}s:10:"�*�actions";a:5:{i:0;O:53:"taoQTI_models_classes_QTI_response_SetOutcomeVariable":2:{s:25:"outcomeVaria
